article_title: Ex-Dewey & LeBoeuf Executives Settle With Bankruptcy Trustee
article_text:
Two former Dewey & LeBoeuf LLP executives have settled a civil suit brought by the defunct firm's bankruptcy trustee to recover nearly $22 million, according to a Tuesday court filing.

No details of the settlement---reached with Dewey's ex-chief financial officer, Joel Sanders, and former executive director, Stephen DiCarmine---were immediately available Tuesday. A one-paragraph order from U.S. Bankruptcy Judge Martin Glenn...
